s.text: she said you should have done pansies and i went well now you tell me so that first night that on Halloween we went out and covered them with a sheet and they did okay that first night but the second night we were at the movies and didn't do it so i guess i've lost them
i do it myself have a lot of people trying to do it for me but hey i need the exercise so what the heck
